body.name: FRESOUGHT Workout Gym Biker Shorts Women Tummy Control High Waisted Seamless Scrunch Butt Yoga Booty Spandex Shorts
features: ✨ Upgraded Scrunch Design: You asked, and we listened! The upgraded fabric uses blended yarn, which has a better texture and is less see-through. Some spandex with Lycra content is also added to the waistband to make it more elastic and resilient. Our seamless scrunch workout shorts 5" feature a stylish and UPGRADED scrunch design on the back, providing a flattering, comfortable, and fashionable look for any workout.

✨ Seamless Gym Shorts: Our workout shorts are designed with seamless technology, ensuring a comfortable and flexible fit that moves with your body during any physical activity no matter the intensity. The crotch of the seamless shorts has added viscose technology to achieve better squat proof effect.
✨ Moisture-Wicking Fabric: The fabric used in our booty athletic biker shorts is moisture-wicking, keeping you cool and dry even during the most intense workouts.

✨ Versatile: Our seamless shorts are versatile and can be worn for a variety of activities, such as yoga, running, cycling, or weightlifting. Your Perfect Gym Fit with a stretchy and form-fitting design, our seamless scrunch workout shorts are perfect for any body type and will provide the right amount of support for all types of physical activities.

✨ FRESOUGHT Activewear. We focus on creating stylish and comfortable activewear for women that promotes body positivity and self-expression. The designs incorporate bold colors and unique patterns, and the materials are breathable and moisture-wicking for maximum comfort during physical activity. We are always aiming towards being better and providing the best service to our community. If you have any questions, or suggestions or just want to say "Hi" don't hesitate to reach out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These shorts, while cute, weren’t exactly what I thought they would be. They provided excellent tummy control while I was working out, but anytime I moved a certain way or sat down, they would roll up into the crotch area, which became vastly uncomfortable. It was also exceedingly awkward to attempt to discreetly fix the problem in the gym as well.

reviews.reviewerName: John M. Cape, Author of Poorly Zeroed:  A Net Zero Travesty.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Order a Size Up
reviews.reviewText: Able to pull these pants on - given the spandex - but it was not a comfortable fit. It fit tighter than a glove and was stretched thin. The small size runs like an extra small.Recommend you consider ordering a larger size than your normal size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tight Fitting Gym Shorts; Amazing You're In Shape; Great Value for Cost
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these in size small as gym shorts, and they fit as expected. They looked like they'd be too small out of the package but have faith: they're meant to be worn tight, and they stretch a lot.The fabric is soft and comfy. They're very form fitting, so you have to be comfortable with shorts that look and fit like underwear, but if that's what you're looking for, these are great.Overall, very pleased, would order again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for me!
reviews.reviewText: I exercise so I wear compression short let a lot to go to the gym. These shorts are more like shapewear to me . Maybe if you were in perfect shape and young these might look good on you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got the XL but I find they fit way too snug for me to be comfortable while exercising.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not incredibly flattering
reviews.reviewText: These shorts are definitely comfy AND squat proof. They aren't the most flattering on me but I'll definitely make them work. They look extremely small from the package but stretch perfectly when you put them on which is what had me worried about them being sheer. 4 overall but added a star because they came literally the day after I ordered them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Run small & see through
reviews.reviewText: Ordered an XL, my usual size in leggings, and they're stretched so thin that they're as see through as pantyhose.Definitely won't be able to use these as workout shorts, but they do have good compression & length, so they'll work as slip shorts/shapewear for under dresses.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Huge stretch potential
reviews.reviewText: I got this a size smaller.. I am 220lbs and I got it in a L and the stretch potential is amazing. I should’ve gotten an XL due to the thigh length but the tummy tick in part is no Joke. I would re buy it just closer to my size. Great for cycling. Good price for the amazing quality. Definitely love them
